main event: A USAF pilot in Alaska observed an elliptical-shaped unidentified object around 5 feet in diameter moving at an estimated speed of over 2,000 mph at an altitude of 11,000-12,000 feet on February 9, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as red and white in color.
The object was observed for about 2 minutes.
The pilot was an experienced USAF pilot.
The sighting occurred in Alaska at coordinates 52N 171W.
The report includes sketches of the sighting dated January 2, 1955.
sighted object: elliptical-shaped object around 5 feet in diameter
